mapper.insert: INSERT INTO sm_product_review (id, user_id, product_id, board_id, content, subject, score) VALUES (review_id_seq.nextval, #{userId}, #{productId}, 1, #{content}, #{subject}, #{score})
mapper.select: SELECT user_id AS userId, product_id AS productId, regdate, subject, content, score, board_id as boardId, answer_flag AS answerFlag FROM sm_product_review WHERE product_id = #{productId}
SELECT user_id AS userId, product_id AS productId, regdate, content, score, board_id as boardId, answer_flag AS answerFlag FROM sm_product_review WHERE user_id = #{userId}
SELECT user_id AS userId, id, product_id AS productId, regdate, content, score, board_id as boardId, answer_flag AS answerFlag FROM sm_product_review order by regdate desc
SELECT distinct(bm.product_id) AS "productId" FROM SM_buy_manage bm WHERE bm.product_id = #{productId} AND bm.buy_id in (SELECT id FROM SM_buy_info WHERE user_id = #{userId})
